医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
化合物管理及其在早期药物研究中的关键作用在比利时布鲁塞尔举行的 SLAS EU 2023 上进行的采访中，我们采访了阿斯利康首席科学家 Silvio Di Castro，了解了他的研究以及化合物管理在药物研究中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Compound-Management-and-its-Crucial-Role-in-Early-Pharmaceutical-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Compound-Management-and-its-Crucial-Role-in-Early-Pharmaceutical-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8a0bd26-4b48-49ce-8cdf-7aa1f19ecaff Tue, 05 Sep 2023 08:26:00 -0400 Compound Management and its Crucial Role in Early Pharmaceutical Research
禽流感病毒的突变可能会增加传播给人类的风险中国和诺丁汉研究人员的一项新研究发现，中国家禽养殖场流行的禽流感病毒亚型正在发生突变，这可能会增加该疾病传播给人类的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Mutational-changes-in-Avian-flu-virus-could-increase-risk-of-transmission-to- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Mutational-changes-in-Avian-flu-virus-could-increase-risk-of-transmission-to- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=378346a2-f4d6-4c92-b815-7e88a20bd1a1 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 08:14:39 -0400 Mutational changes in Avian flu virus could increase risk of transmission to humans
基于NGS的筛查发现了中国赣州罕见的新型地中海贫血突变全球约 5.2% 的人口携带异常血红蛋白基因。全世界每年有 300,000 至 500,000 名儿童出生时患有严重的血红蛋白病，其中约 80% 的病例发生在发展中国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/NGS-based-screening-identizes-rare-and-novel-thalassemia-mutations-in-Ganzhou-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/NGS-based-screening-identizes-rare-and-novel-thalassemia-mutations-in-Ganzhou-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1ecb3de-f599-44ca-b8ca-5516da157e50 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 08:01:43 -0400 NGS-based screening identifies rare and novel thalassemia mutations in Ganzhou, China
英国政府向药品制造技能卓越中心投资 550 万英镑政府正在帮助维持和发展英国 280,000 名生命科学劳动力，截至今天（9 月 5 日星期二）宣布斥资 550 万英镑建立药品制造技能卓越中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/UK-government-invests-c2a355-million-in-Medicines-Manufacturing-Skills-Centre-of-Excellence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/UK-government-invests-c2a355-million-in-Medicines-Manufacturing-Skills-Centre-of-Excellence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d1453a9-0faa-456b-b540-52b2c13c2d1f Tue, 05 Sep 2023 07:54:27 -0400 UK government invests £5.5 million in Medicines Manufacturing Skills Centre of Excellence
国会和雇主争论热力监管的必要性，工人们为此付出了代价加利福尼亚州圣华金河谷的农场工人卡门·加西亚说，有时高温会让你呕吐。她和丈夫在大蒜田里度过了 7 月，跪在烧焦的土地上，气温高达 105 度以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Workers-pay-the-price-while-Congress-and-employers-debate-need-for-heat-regulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Workers-pay-the-price-while-Congress-and-employers-debate-need-for-heat-regulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc1a4820-e5c7-4905-8942-83eac581988c Tue, 05 Sep 2023 07:34:15 -0400 Workers pay the price while Congress and employers debate need for heat regulations
密西西比州的宫颈癌死亡表明更广泛的医疗保健问题谢门特·琼斯知道事情有些不对劲。她的背很痛。她在性交时感到疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Mississippie28099s-cervical-cancer-deaths-indicate-broader-health-care-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Mississippie28099s-cervical-cancer-deaths-indicate-broader-health-care-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1f4bc92-0bfd-406d-bdd9-5afc8edc2cd7 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 07:31:50 -0400 Mississippi’s cervical cancer deaths indicate broader health care problems
新研究称，SARS-CoV-2刺突蛋白可能会加速阿尔茨海默病和其他脑部疾病的发展瑞典研究人员发现，SARS-CoV-2 的刺突蛋白淀粉样蛋白可以加速与克雅氏病和阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病相关的有害蛋白聚集体的形成。该研究表明，COVID-19 与这些脑部疾病病例增加之间存在潜在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/SARS-CoV-2-spike- Protein-could-be-speeding-up-Alzheimers-and-other-brain-diseases-says-new-study。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/SARS-CoV-2-spike- Protein-could-be-speeding-up-Alzheimers-and-other-brain-diseases-says-new-study。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48147c4b-9413-4d66-a0e4-a64d1808e63b Tue, 05 Sep 2023 00:56:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 spike protein could be speeding up Alzheimer's and other brain diseases, says new study
SARS-CoV-2 如何劫持脆弱 X 蛋白以加剧感染：COVID-19 和遗传性疾病的新线索研究探索了 SARS-CoV-2 的非结构蛋白 3 (NSP3) 与脆性 X 型智力迟钝 (FMRP) 相关蛋白之间的相互作用，为了解 COVID-19 的病理生理学提供了线索。研究表明，病毒利用这些宿主细胞蛋白进行有效感染，并可能干扰抗病毒防御机制，为脆性 X 综合征的遗传基础提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/How-SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-Fragile-X- Proteins-to-fuel-infection-New-clues-in-COVID-19-and-遗传疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/How-SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-Fragile-X- Proteins-to-fuel-infection-New-clues-in-COVID-19-and-遗传疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6f633e6-586e-4f07-ab47-467018100dd5 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 00:41:00 -0400 How SARS-CoV-2 hijacks Fragile X proteins to fuel infection: New clues in COVID-19 and genetic disorders
SARS-CoV-2 Eris 变种传播速度更快并逃避免疫研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 EG.5.1“Eris”变种的特征，发现与 XBB.1.5 变种相比，它在仓鼠中更容易传播，并且在逃避免疫方面稍好一些。结果表明，这些特性可能推动该变体在人群中的流行率不断上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/SARS-CoV-2-Eris-variant-spreads-faster-and-dodges-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/SARS-CoV-2-Eris-variant-spreads-faster-and-dodges-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e5598a-e813-46cb-b27a-4d96536ad556 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 00:31:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 Eris variant spreads faster and dodges immunity
ChatGPT 可以成为糖尿病顾问吗？研究探讨了潜力和陷阱这项综合研究探讨了 ChatGPT 回答有关糖尿病问题的能力，并将其与丹麦糖尿病中心的人类专家进行了比较。虽然熟悉的用户可以更频繁地发现人工智能生成的答案，但该研究强调需要对人工智能进行严格评估和安全集成到医疗保健中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-ChatGPT-be-a-diabetes-consultant-Study-probes-the-pottial-and-pitfalls.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-ChatGPT-be-a-diabetes-consultant-Study-probes-the-pottial-and-pitfalls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e676128-642e-46c5-ad34-5e0705da849f Tue, 05 Sep 2023 00:06:00 -0400 Can ChatGPT be a diabetes consultant? Study probes the potential and pitfalls
